title: Drawing, "Drawing. Sketch. Landscape near Pandi, Colombia", July 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on brown paper.
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at bottom left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  Great variety of greens in the              distance and middle / distance; agian, at center right:  clouds; again, at              lower center:  weedy bushes; again, at lower right:   From the house of Dr.                 Garcia near Pandi; and at bottom center: [an arrow pointing up] North.
Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  1917.4.81 / I79
description: Horizontal view of a mountain range rising from the mist.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing. Sketch. Landscape near Pandi, Colombia", July 1853.
July 1853. Graphite, brush and oxidized white gouache on brown paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-81.
